Enigma API Specification

This documentation describes the Enigma Operating System project.

See:
          Description

Packages
enigma.console Provides text-mode support classes, most notably Console and TextWindow.
enigma.console.java2d Provides a pure-Java implementation of the TextWindow API using Swing and Java2D.
enigma.console.remote An implementation of Console which allows its display to be sent over a network.
enigma.console.terminal Provides terminal emulation classes to be used with Console.
enigma.core Provides core Enigma classes used (knowingly or unknowingly) by every program running under Enigma.
enigma.event Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with events fired by Enigma components.
enigma.loaders Provides classes which allow programs of various types to be loaded and executed under Enigma.
enigma.shells.commandline Contains the Enigma command-line shell, a console-mode program.

 

This documentation describes the Enigma Operating System project. More information about the Enigma project's status and goals is available from the Enigma home page.
